cethric.xge.engine

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • cethric.xge.engine.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IIntractable, IWindow

    public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWindow
    Created by blakerogan on 22/02/15. This class defines a basic window, with a render/update loop.

        Parameters:

        y - double; the y position of the mouse
